dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 2817 IH: National Historic Preservation Amendments Act of 2015
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Turner (for himself, Mr. Blumenauer, Mrs. Lummis, Mr. Grijalva, Mr. Gibson, Mr. Cartwright, Mr. Katko, Ms. Tsongas, Mr. Abraham, Mr. Fitzpatrick, and Mr. Clyburn) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend title 54, United States Code, to extend the authorization of appropriations for the Historic Preservation Fund.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the National Historic Preservation Amendments Act of 2015.

section.header: Reauthorization of the Historic Preservation Fund

subsection.text: Section 303102 of title 54, United States Code, is amended by striking 2015 and inserting 2025.

paragraph.text: Section 303102 of such title is amended by striking Contents in the heading thereof and inserting Funding.
The table of sections for chapter 3031 of such title is amended by striking the item relating to section 303102 and inserting the following new item:
